com.sun.speech.engine.synthesis
Class BaseSynthesizerProperties

java.lang.Object
  com.sun.speech.engine.BaseEngineProperties
      com.sun.speech.engine.synthesis.BaseSynthesizerProperties
All Implemented Interfaces:
SpeechEventDispatcher, EngineProperties, SynthesizerProperties
public class BaseSynthesizerProperties
extends BaseEngineProperties
implements SynthesizerProperties

Supports the JSAPI 1.0 SynthesizerProperties interface. The properties of a Synthesizer are:

  • Speaking voice,
  • Baseline pitch,
  • Pitch range,
  • Speaking rate,
  • Volume.
